merpi_desc: %USER's face, beautiful or handsome. It's right there, so close. You could just...

merpi_flowery: %USER pushes their head forwards and bashes it agianst %TARGET's %T_PART, rapidly, and aggressively!  Oh god!!
%USER brings their face in close to %TARGET's %T_PART, nuzzling it softly and affectionately.

merpi_normal: %USER rubs their face against %TARGET's %T_PART like a cat!
merpi_flowery: %USER nuzzles their face gently against %TARGET's %T_PART, the motions fairly similar to a cat rubbings it's face on something.
%USER brings their face up to %TARGET's %T_PART, pushing against it in a warm and affectionate manner.
%USER just heaps affection on %TARGET's %T_PART with their face, rubbing it all over themselves!
%USER reaches out and smacks %TARGET's %T_PART against their face in an overly playful manner!
%USER reaches out and smooshes %TARGET's %T_PART directly to their face, dragging it around for fun!

merpi_normal: %USER smushes %TARGET's %T_PART to their face a bit too hard!
merpi_flowery: %USER really pushes %TARGET's %T_PART into their face, maybe even a little bit too hard!

merpi_normal: %USER really gets their face all sorts of up into %TARGET's %T_PART!
merpi_flowery: %USER just can't get their face off of %TARGET's %T_PART, they've basically buried their face in it at this point!
